title: Bir Derdim Var
overview: In this innovative series aiming to shine a ray of hope on teenagers and families grappling with adolescence issues, we will witness the discovery of the secrets of the human mind while walking on shards of glass alongside Doctor Nilüfer Toska (Birce Akalay), who is always one step ahead of her colleagues, and we will see that hope is always hidden in life. Dr. Nilüfer's relentless pursuit of a secret that could endanger her profession will turn into a major conflict with the uncompromising Prosecutor Ömer (Mert Firat), creating a massive fire.
